verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees. <WH4609> I will lift <WH5375> up my eyes <WH5869> to the hills, <WH2022> from where <WH370> comes <WH935> my help. <WH5828>
My help <WH5828> comes from the LORD, <WH3068> which made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth. <WH776>
He will not suffer <WH5414> your foot <WH7272> to be moved: <WH4132> he that keeps <WH8104> you will not slumber. <WH5123>
Behold, <WH2009> he that keeps <WH8104> Israel <WH3478> shall neither <WH3808> slumber <WH5123> nor <WH3808> sleep. <WH3462>
The LORD <WH3068> is your keeper: <WH8104> the LORD <WH3068> is your shade <WH6738> on your right <WH3225> hand. <WH3027>
The sun <WH8121> shall not smite <WH5221> you by day, <WH3119> nor the moon <WH3394> by night. <WH3915>
The LORD <WH3068> shall preserve <WH8104> you from all <WH3605> evil: <WH7451> he shall preserve <WH8104> your soul. <WH5315>
The LORD <WH3068> shall preserve <WH8104> your going <WH3318> out and your coming <WH935> in from this time forth, and even for ever more. <WH5769>
